sentences.en: B: Does Yahoo Messenger have the function of voice or webcam?
sentences.cn: 雅虎信使有语音和网络视频功能 吗 ?

sentences.en: Like other company, yahoo also gets the concussion of financial crisis.
sentences.cn: 像其他公司一样, 雅虎也受到金融危机的冲击.

sentences.en: Nowdays , we have many Internet search engines, such as Google, Yahoo, WebCrawler.
sentences.cn: 现有的Internet搜索引擎如:Google, Yahoo, WebCrawler等, 可以帮助人们搜索Internet上各种信息.

sentences.en: Participating newspapers more than doubled their Web traffic from Yahoo.
sentences.cn: 参与报纸的Yahoo网站浏览量增加一倍多.

sentences.en: Sites such as Yahoo provide ways to search for people.
sentences.cn: 站点譬如雅虎提供方式寻找人.

sentences.en: The destiny of Yahoo search business also have not Anacreontic.
sentences.cn: 雅虎搜索业务的命运也尚未明朗.

sentences.en: The pair were said to be considering a joint bid for Yahoo!
sentences.cn: 新闻集团既是传统新闻巨头,同样也是个精明的新媒体运作者.

sentences.en: They go online to a search engine like Google or Yahoo.
sentences.cn: 他们会去网上的搜索引擎.

sentences.en: Yahoo ! and Microsoft have been talking, off and on, since last year.
sentences.cn: 微软公司在网络业务上与谷歌的差距更远.

sentences.en: Yahoo and Google deal of news advertisers about ad rates will rise.
sentences.cn: 雅虎与谷歌达成交易的消息令广告客户担忧广告费率会上涨.

sentences.en: Yahoo is the oldest and best-known Web directory service.
sentences.cn: 雅虎是最早且最知名的因特网目录服务网站。

sentences.en: Yahoo was the exception, but Excite, Infoseek, HotBot and Lycos began as search engines.
sentences.cn: Yahoo是个例外, 但是Excite, Infoseek, HotBot和 Lycos都开始转型成为了搜索引擎.

sentences.en: Yahoo! The Pain has Just Started?
Yahoo's news traffic jumped 20 percent compared to the norm for AP stories.
sentences.cn: Yahoo上的新闻流量与正常状态下的AP新闻相比增长了20%.

phrases.tran_cn: 雅虎搜索（世界上最大的搜寻器之一）

trans.tran_cn: 雅虎，（英国作家Swift小说中<<格列佛游记>>中的）人行兽，yahoo此字可追溯到格利佛的<小人国游记>，yahoo的意思是各种野蛮，粗鲁的人
trans.tran_en: You can refer to people as yahoos when you disapprove of them because they behave in a noisy or stupid way
